ygData.subject: Re: On Tinkering books
ygData.msgSnippet: No they make the bow we take that bow and combine the cams bolts and grease I think and get the new bow.  Am going to try and find the gnome mage who was doing
ygData.messageBody:
No they make the bow we take that bow and combine the cams bolts and grease
I think and get the new bow. Am going to try and find the gnome mage who
was doing it and ask him what exactly you need. Not sure if it is any bow
or specific one.

<-- Enigma -->
http://members.door.net/enigma



-----Original Message-----
From: Rick Jones [SMTP:rjones@...]
Sent: Thursday, May 27, 1999 2:18 AM
To: EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [EQ_Tinkering] On Tinkering books

From: "Rick Jones" <rjones@...>



Enigma wrote:

> From: Enigma <enigma@...>
>
> I checked EVERY NPC IN and Around Akanon there are no others with books
(On
> Fen Ro at least). What is the big deal about the flameless lantern??
Why
> is it better than a normal. Also A Bower says we can make improved
> longbows for them.
>
> <-- Enigma -->
> Tech Supervisor of The Door ISP
> http://members.door.net/enigma
> UIN:364996

Flameless Lanterns? Nothing really. If you're a human and don't have dual
weild, it's good.
as bright as a Lightstone (Not greater) and shows up on your character.

-Zikkin

p.s.
We can't make the bow. We can make the CAMS, they make the bow with the
Cams
we make.
At least that's what I've heard.
